column2: Surface error nodes on top of build steps

column3:
This is the PR for the work we discussed on the BOW.
Instead of attaching nodes to the root, I created an intermediate build step node. If an error group with a failure is created, it will be attached to the root, before the build steps.

Feel free to ping me if you have another idea.
Thanks,
Vadim
I'm having one issue though, which is that I wanted the first error lead node to be expanded but it does not seem to work.
Surface error nodes on top of build steps
